pages.commentary: Welcome to the portfolio. This is a placeholder commentary that will help visualize the styling of the commentary overlay. You can edit this text in the portfolio.json file.
The commentary overlay appears at the bottom of the screen and provides context for each page. It's designed to be readable but not intrusive.
This is a longer piece of placeholder text to test how the commentary overlay handles multiple lines of text. The overlay should adjust its height automatically while maintaining readability.
The commentary is styled with a semi-transparent background and subtle blur effect for better readability against any background.
You can customize the commentary for each page individually. This allows for detailed explanations of your work.
